name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatFlat: Chat with any flat of Idelista/AirBnB with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to chat with any flat of Idelista/AirBnB with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this Chrome extension to chat with AI about all the properties listed on Airbnb and Idealista. More markets will be added soon. We provide the AI with comprehensive information about each listing, including images, so you can ask anything you need to make the right decision.
